## ProgramBuilder.outerProduct() method

Same as outerProduct builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL2 device

**Signature:**

```typescript
outerProduct(x: PBShaderExp, y: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  y | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
